products.title: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately).

products.title: Eco Friendly Fr White Recycled Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

Ideal for a soft, feminine bedroom, a bathroom or to add a delicate focal point in a kitchen, this dreamy blind is made using a blackout fabric to keep daylight out when you need to and a safe, flame retardant finish.

products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Aloe Green Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Isla pvc blackout aloe green double-sided electric roller blind features a soft wash of calming blue, instantly transporting you to the long, hot days of summer. With a textured leafy design, its ideal for adding a gentle splash colour to a serene room. The blackout fabric will keep light away when you want to shut the world out and its flame retardant too for extra safety. Isla pvc blackout aloe green is made of moisture resistant fabric, so it's extremely easy to keep it clean.

products.title: Willow Blackout Birch White Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Soft, muted grey with wispy willow branches make a delicate willow blackout birch white electric blackout roller blind choice for a bedroom or living area. It blends well with most neutral dcor and gives a feminine yet contemporary feel to your chosen space. Finished with pollergen, it is a good option for hayfever sufferers as it neutralises pollen so reducing symptoms. The electric operation is easy to use and the blind opens and closes at the touch of a button.
